Get ESPN men's college basketball standings

Source: R/espn_mbb_data.R
espn_mbb_standings.Rd

Get ESPN men's college basketball standings

Usage

espn_mbb_standings(year)

Arguments

year

Either numeric or character (YYYY)

Value

A standings data frame

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(espn_mbb_standings(2021))
#> ── ESPN MBB Standings Information from ESPN.com ───────────────── hoopR 1.7.0 ──
